hadith.text: Narrated Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri:"Banu Salamah's dwellings were on the outskirts of Al-Madinah, so they wanted to relocate closer to the Masjid. Then this Ayah was revealed: 'Verily, We give life to the dead, and We record that which they send before (them), and their traces... (36:12)' So the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: 'Your steps are recorded, so do not relocate
